alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 4:15AM EST until January 10 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast to south winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts as high as 40 to 55 mph expected through midday today. Locally higher gusts are possible in locations immediately downwind of Black and Pine Mountains. After a lull in the winds this afternoon, winds will turn southwest to west and increase to between 15 and 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected this evening through early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Harlan and Letcher Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
